description: Try our easy to follow Homemade Lemonade recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Homemade Lemonade Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Roughly chop lemons and limes and place in a large glass bowl. Add sugar and mint. Using clean hands, squeeze the fruit to release the juice. Stir in 3 cups water and set aside for 30 minutes.
Strain through a fine sieve into a large jug, pressing on the peel to extract all of the juice. Discard peel.
Place ice in serving glasses, add lemonade syrup and top with chilled soda or mineral water.
